pli-tv-bi-vb-pc79:0.2_0: The account of the nun Analysis
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc79:0.3_0: The chapter on offenses entailing confession
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc79:0.5_0: The training rule on obstructing one’s kin
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc79:1.10_0: the Buddha said, “And, monks, the nuns should recite this training rule like this:
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc79:1.11.1_0: ‘If a nun gives the full admission to a trainee nun who is socializing with men and boys and who is temperamental and difficult to live with, she commits an offense entailing confession.’”
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc79:1.1_0: At one time when the Buddha was staying at Sāvatthī in the Anāthapiṇḍika’s Monastery,
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc79:1.2_0: At that time the nun Thullanandā gave the full admission to the trainee nun Caṇḍakāḷī, who was socializing with men and boys, and who was temperamental and difficult to live with.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc79:1.3_0: The nuns of few desires complained and criticized Thullanandā,
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc79:1.4_0: “How could Venerable Thullanandā give the full admission to the trainee nun Caṇḍakāḷī, who is socializing with men and boys, and who is temperamental and difficult to live with?” ...
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc79:1.5_0: “Is it true, monks, that the nun Thullanandā did this?”
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc79:1.8_0: “... How could the nun Thullanandā do this?
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc79:1.9_0: This won’t give rise to confidence in those without it ...” ...
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc79:2.1.10_0: with improper bodily and verbal conduct.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc79:2.1.14_0: she causes suffering to others, and grieves herself.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc79:2.1.16_0: one training for two years in the six rules.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc79:2.1.19_0: If, intending to give full admission, she searches for a group, a teacher, a bowl, or a robe, or she establishes a monastic boundary, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc79:2.1.20_0: for the effort there is an act of wrong conduct.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc79:2.1.21_0: and the last announcement is made by two announcements.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc79:2.1.22_0: When the last announcement is finished, the preceptor commits an offense entailing confession,
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc79:2.1.23_0: while the group and the teacher commit an offense of wrong conduct.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc79:2.1.4_0: ... The nun who has been given the full ordination in unanimity by both Sanghas through a legal procedure consisting of one motion and three announcements that is irreversible and fit to stand—this sort of nun is meant in this case.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc79:2.1.6_0: those who have reached twenty years of age.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc79:2.1.8_0: who has not reached twenty years.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc79:2.2.2_0: if she gives her the full admission without knowing what she is like;
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc79:2.2.4_0: if she is the first offender.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc79:2.2.5_0: The ninth rule, the training rule on nine, is finished.
